name: eDrone
headline: Integrate with eDrone CRM
overview: The first eCRM exclusive for eCommerce. eDrone is an AI tool for eCommerce that uses Data Mining and Machine Learning to identify, register and monitor visitors to your website. The behavioral data generated by edrone feed the system of product recommendations by Email, Push, SMS and mainly our On-Site Recommendations (Dynamic Showcase) that are designed exclusively for each client.
features: Integrate with edrone and track pixel events
additionalInformation: You need to be registered and provide an eDrone app id.
